tokens.name: STOLE / SOL
tokens.ai_reasoning:
**Rationale:**  
- **BUY Signal:** Buy/Sell Ratio (1.5) > 1.5 + Strong buying pressure (196 buys vs. 104 sells) + Recent 5 trades (5 buys) + Stable flow momentum.  
- **Limit Order:** 0% (market order) due to strong buying pressure, despite high volatility (53.3% price change).  
- **Take Profit:** +25% (mid-range of high-volume TP range: +20%–+40%) to capitalize on liquidity.  
- **Stop Loss:** -20% (mid-range of high-volatility SL range: -15%–-25%) to account for potential retracements.  
- **Time Frame:** 30min to 2h (high-volatility range) to capture short-term momentum while avoiding overexposure.
